notes.text:
This update for openldap2 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-2953: Fixed null pointer deref in ber_memalloc_x (bsc#1211795).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A vulnerability was found in openldap. This security flaw causes a null pointer dereference in ber_memalloc_x() function.
notes.title: CVE description
